extension.description: Download and install addons by The[COLOR tan]Highway[/COLOR]. You cand find me on addons.center's forum ( http://forum.addons.center/ ). Also I'm often on irc.snoonet.org:6667 #The_Projects for those who have a IRC Chat client. We're often AFK or busy with other things, so feel free to sit with us or drop a message for us to read when we get a chance.
